claim: Virtual camera system requires a computer to use.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Fusion Camera System  (  a.k.a. Reality Camera System 1  )  is a Digital movie camera system developed by James Cameron and Vince Pace .

claim: Virtual camera system requires a computer to use.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In 3D video games , a virtual camera system aims at controlling a camera or a set of cameras to display a view of a 3D virtual world .

claim: Virtual camera system requires a computer to use.
premise_source_doc_sentence: As opposed to film makers , virtual camera system creators have to deal with a world that is interactive and unpredictable .

claim: Virtual camera system requires a computer to use.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The Fusion Camera System made first use of Sony HDC-F950 and later of Sony HDC-1500 HD cameras when they became available .

claim: Virtual camera system requires a computer to use.
premise_source_doc_sentence: A key point of a virtual studio is that the real camera can move in 3D space , while the image of the virtual camera is being rendered in real-time from the same perspective , therefore , this virtual scene has to adapt at any time to the camera settings  (  zoom , pan , angle , traveling , etc.  )  .
